survey_responses.What do you think your life might be lik:
My life will be more technologically advanced than it is now. As AI and Automation are growing very fast, many things will go online. Climate change will also impact as rain, summer, and winter seasons are determined by climate only. Fast growth in Urbanization will lead to a concern for food, shelter, and natural resources. My life will be easy, but it could be competitive for my children to get natural resources. 

The biggest difference in daily life I notice is things will be automated.
survey_responses.What is another dangerous outcome you ca:
Privacy concern such as leakage of personal data, and deep fake technology that criminals may use to defame anyone. 
AI technology will certainly improve life but the challenge is with its uses. Many of us have the freedom to do everything if AI technology is aligned with such fundamental rights.
survey_responses.What is another positive outcome you can: It is making me productive in my work by providing concise information that I need for my work. Also, Data analytics, modeling, and speech recognition technology have filled the social gap. Another big advantage we are seeing AI uses machine learning which will definitely provide the desired results in any field we implement AI or its related technologies.
survey_responses.What are the first decisions in your lif:
To utilize AI technology to improve my well-being, and increase my productivity.

As of Now I have used AI for my personal use without considering the drawbacks or limitations it has.
survey_responses.Describe a concrete scenario where you w: I fear leaking my personal data to the public and being misused by someone else. Although some consent are given but not sure where and who can misuse my information. Particularly deep fake technology.
survey_responses.Explain what makes one of these scenario:
Future D makes better because small ecosystem will highlight many aspects of life, uses and advancement needed for the development of humans. However potential misuse is another big question that has to be addressed wisely by the judiciary of any government.

Diverse applications will also lead to challenges that we will be able to see when implementing AI for daily life.
I prefer future E because we all need support to grow in life, to maintain harmony and love and relationships.
survey_responses.What is ONE specific ethical or moral pr: Respect for Human Life. Because once we give respect we feel valued and this makes a sense of our gratitude, affection, caring, etc.
survey_responses.What is one ethical or moral principle,:
Companies should follow ethical principles to create AI technology. Any biased belief may result in harm to society and people.

Respect for life, Environmental concerns, accountability all are important we can't just ignore them all and focus on only one to create AI technology for future use.
survey_responses.What do you consider your culture? What: I consider my language, festivals and other religious belief as my culture. Moreover, AI systems should prevent in misguiding cultural beliefs.
survey_responses.What is one unique perspective that your: The thinking of helping nature and support each one in life, values we adapt from cultural beliefs are different than those others have. I preserve into Hinduism culture so follow traditions of my family but they may not aligned with other community.
survey_responses.What kinds of cultural things would you: I believe language barrier are not a deciding factors hw AI should be used. The only thing is we could lose our cultural values and traditions when it comes to specific language AL was trained. Language is also a symbol of culture.
survey_responses.What is the biggest problem in your life:
Being healthy and wealthy are my biggest problem as of now but I desire to become financial free by next 15-20 years If i focus on any business. AI indeed is helping creators, and professionals to grow in life with more productivity. 

I know people who use AI to create resumes, job search they get the job they wanted but more important is on a large scale the use of AI is limited to specific age group or qualified individuals. Many rural people are still far behind of this AI technology.
survey_responses.What would you consider giving your life: I think we should have enough time after work so that our relationships, and families feel happy about us. Giving more time, and spending quality time to have fun, and happiness is neccessary to enjoy life. If AI could help to balance our work and life it will be a true achievement because nowadays everyone is workaholics not intentionally but under pressure the companies put to meet deadlines of work. Work is never ending process we should also understand this.
survey_responses.What is something unique, that other peo: More freedom of work and choose what we want in life. Financial freedom and Natural resources preservation will be of utmost important shortly.
survey_responses.What are you most scared will be true in: Unethical use of AI technology and consequently the results arising from misuse of personal data.
survey_responses.If you could make world leaders understa: Sustainable and Ethical use of AI Technology
survey_responses.Lastly, is there anything you felt you c: The only thing I noticed here is how AI technology has improved over the last few years, was absent. we should have general feedback on the same. All questions were related to the future but Present scenarios are also important to identify the gaps, challenges, and improvements needed.
